description:
Chad`s journey to the Senzaikyu is interrupted by the Captain of Squad 8, Shunsui Kyouraka.  Kyouraka`s laid-back mentality and attempt to convince Chad to retreat irks Chad and tries his patience.  Chad realizes that time is of the essence and that he must proceed to meet the rest of the Ryoka.  As Chad starts to battle, he has flashbacks to the world of the living where he is reminded of his promise to Ichigo.
Source: crunchyroll
